${ModID}:OttosDeck.NAME: Otto's Deck
${ModID}:OttosDeck.FLAVOR: Otto's deck is chess themed. Hm.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, replace your basic #yStrikes and #yDefends with #yPawn's #yAdvances. Obtain a random #bUncommon and #yRare #pChess #pCard.

${ModID}:CardboardHeart.NAME: Cardboard Heart
${ModID}:CardboardHeart.FLAVOR: Slain adventurer's decks form this lump of fibrous board.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, choose between
. Add the chosen card into your hand with #yRetain.
Choose a card to add into your hand.
When obtained, picks #b3 random cards. Choose #b1 of #b3 of the set to add into your hand with #yRetain each combat.

${ModID}:BucketOfSlime.NAME: Bucket Of Slime
${ModID}:BucketOfSlime.FLAVOR: A bucket of slime! Useful and multipurpose! Huh? What purpose? I'm just a salesman, figure that out yourself.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play each card in your deck each combat, gain #b1 #yBlock.

${ModID}:WarBannerCultist.NAME: Cultist War Banner
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yRitual and lose #b2 #yStrength.

${ModID}:WarBannerLouse.NAME: Louse War Banner
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b10 #yCurl #yUp. When #yCurl #yUp is triggered, #yBlock is not lost this turn.

${ModID}:WarBannerNob.NAME: Nob War Banner
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b%d enemy actions each combat that are not attacks grant you #b1 #yStrength. Start each combat with #b%d #yVulnerable.

${ModID}:Lucky.NAME: Lucky
${ModID}:Lucky.FLAVOR: Those who give back to the less fortunate always find themselves rewarded somehow.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the Boss combat of this Battle Tower, gain 2 #yStrength and 2 #yDexterity.

${ModID}:IronPotHelmet.NAME: Iron Pot Helmet
${ModID}:IronPotHelmet.FLAVOR: It once was special and enchanted. Now it's just a big hunk of metal.

${ModID}:CursedDoll.NAME: Cursed Doll
${ModID}:CursedDoll.FLAVOR: It's filled with pins and needles . . . and it looks surprisingly like you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, ALL enemies also lose twice that much HP.
